A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A bold new Star Wars film that isn't afraid to take chances. Not every chance pays off\, but overall the film gives fans the Star Wars experience they've been waiting for\, even more so than The Force Awakens. My main point of criticism is that there is about 20 minutes that should have been cut\, and the pacing is a tad off. Still\, it's a solid film with much to love.
